org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support
Class AeFault

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support.AeFault
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeFault, IAeFaultTypeInfo, java.io.Serializable
public class AeFault
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeFault

Models BPEL fault objects. These faults can be generated through the execution of an invoke, throw, or through a BPEL error like a bpws:correlationViolation (among others).

See Also:

isSuspendable

public boolean isSuspendable()
Description copied from interface: IAeFault
Return true if this fault can cause the process to be suspended. By default, this value will return true. If will only return false if this fault has already caused the process to be suspended.

Specified by:
isSuspendable in interface IAeFault
See Also:
IAeFault.isSuspendable()
